Ligatne.title: Ligatne
Ligatne.byline: Ligatne (Latvian: Līgatne) is a town in Gauja National Park in Latvia.

Lightning Ridge.title: Lightning Ridge
Lightning Ridge.byline: Lightning Ridge is an opal-mining town in Northwestern New South Wales.

Lignano.title: Lignano
Lignano.byline: Lignano Sabbiadoro  is a seaside resort located on the Adriatic Sea coast of the Friuli-Venezia Giulia region, in the North-Eastern part of Italy.

Liguria.title: Liguria
Liguria.byline: Liguria is one of the official regions of Northwest Italy, on the Ligurian Sea.
